content:
Offer: Building Multiple Streams of Income with Other People's Money 3-Day Challenge

Main Offer:

* Access to all lessons, exercises, and activities for the 3-Day Challenge
* Daily email delivery for the duration of the challenge
* Additional resources and support (e.g. live Q&A sessions, support groups)
* An opportunity to improve money mindset and create multiple streams of income
* A certificate of completion for the challenge

Order Bump #1:

* Access to a pre-recorded webinar on the "Secrets of Building Multiple Streams of Income with Other People's Money"
* A step-by-step guide to help implement what was learned in the challenge

Order Bump #2:

* A one-on-one coaching session with a financial expert
* Personalized support and guidance to help reach financial goals

Upsell #1:

* Access to a 6-week program to go deeper into creating financial freedom
* Includes lessons on investing, building generational wealth, and accessing other people's money

Upsell #2:

* A VIP membership to an exclusive online community
* Access to exclusive resources, webinars, and events
* Personalized support and accountability to help reach financial goals

Downsell Offer:

* Access to the 6-week program at a discounted rate
* Limited access to the online community and exclusive resources
* Personalized support and accountability to help reach financial goals.
